function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Contagious diseases propagation due to a large number of students in a shared environment.","Impact":"Increased risk of contagion and rapid spread of diseases like flu, colds, and other airborne illnesses.","Mitigation":"Implementing strict hygiene measures, promoting vaccination, and enforcing social distancing protocols.","Technologies":"Air purifiers, UV disinfection systems, and touchless fixtures.","People":"Students, faculty, and staff in the educational institution.","Owner":"Education institution, health authorities, and facility management."}]}
